## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7d1bc272c51a6ad1997aaaa84623c7746d308a5e53386e01c6845e1b849c7ffa)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@fdp-tools/artifactory' @ 0.0.10 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
